item.title: Danielle Spencer, Child Star of ‘What’s Happening!!’ Dies at 60
item.description: Danielle Spencer, the actress best known for playing the quick-witted little sister Dee Thomas on the 1970s sitcom “What’s Happening!!” died on Monday at a hospital in Richmond, Va.,
